description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=1/3. The adventure continues! Peril... humour... romance... What surprises await? The mystery deepens… A one player point and click adventure game. Although this is a full game in its own right, It is recommended that you purchase and play Island Adventure part1 first
